allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Extended DEX data collector

This is a data collection tool for Extended DEX (Starknet perpetuals).
Collects orderbook depth and public trades via WebSocket to CSV files.

Features:
- WebSocket streaming for orderbook depth (configurable levels)
- Public trades collection
- Automatic deduplication using trade IDs and sequence numbers
- State persistence for resume capability
- Handles SNAPSHOT and DELTA orderbook updates
- CSV output with buffered writing

Core modules:
- src/bin/collect_data.rs: Main data collection binary
- src/data_collector.rs: CSV writers for orderbook & trades
- src/data_collection_task.rs: Collection task implementation
- src/websocket.rs: WebSocket client
- src/rest.rs: REST API client (read-only)
- src/types.rs: Data types
- src/error.rs: Error handling

Configuration via config.json:
- markets: List of markets to collect
- data_directory: Output directory
- collect_orderbook: Enable orderbook collection
- collect_trades: Enable trades collection
- collect_full_orderbook: Enable full depth collection
- max_depth_levels: Number of orderbook levels (default: 20)

ðŸ¤– Generated with Claude Code

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
